dcterms:creator: Sida Peng
Yuanqing Zhang
Yinghao Xu
Qianqian Wang
Qing Shuai
Hujun Bao
Xiaowei Zhou
dcterms:description: The ZJU-MoCap dataset is a widely used benchmark in human modeling, supplying human masks and SMPL parameters. It is captured in a lab environment, where there is no occlusion, and simulated occlusions are added for training.
dcterms:title: ZJU-MoCap

dcterms:creator: Buzhen Huang
Yuan Shu
Jingyi Ju
Yangang Wang
dcterms:description: The OcMotion dataset is built for human pose estimation under occlusion, containing 43 motions and 300K frames with 3D annotations. It presents real-life scenarios of occlusion.
dcterms:title: OcMotion
